japanese: ……今も世界には、/飢えや病気に苦しむ人々が沢山おられます。
english: ...Even now, many suffer /from hunger and disease.

japanese: ……明後日から普通の授業ですよ！/宿題を忘れないように……ね！
english: ...Regular classes in two days! /Don't forget homework... okay!

japanese: ……水と友達になることだな。/水の中で自由にできれば、/どこでだってできるものだ……。
english: ...Befriend the water. /If you can move freely in it, /you can do it anywhere...

japanese: ……キミの横顔も、/いつもと違う色だな。
english: ...Your profile also /has a different color today.

japanese: ……金魚だからと……、/練習内容を甘くしすぎた……。/……もっと鍛えないとな……。
english: ...I went too easy /because they were goldfish... /...Need to train harder...

japanese: ……水泳部部室に/届けてやってくれないか……？
english: ...Could you deliver this /to the swim team room...?

japanese: ……よく指導に来てるから、別にな……。/２つ学校に通っているみたいで……/大変だ……。
english: ...He coaches often, so it's fine... /Like going to two schools... /Tough...

japanese: ……実はね、家庭科室で作ってたケーキが/あんまりおいしそうだから……つい、ね。/ほら、だって育ち盛りだし！
english: ...Actually, the cake in home ec /looked so good... I couldn't help it. /I'm still growing!

japanese: ……わかったよ。/そこまで言うんなら、一旦戻る。/だけど、あんまり無理すんなよ？
english: ...Got it. /If you insist, I'll go back. /But don't overdo it, okay?

japanese: ……多分、少なくとも、/ソレよりはマシなものができるはずだ。/……じゃ、始めるぜ。
english: ...Probably, at least, /I can make something better. /...Well, let's start.

japanese: 「もう少し時間をくれないか……頼む。/　ＯＫ……それでいい。今夜だな。/　すまない、ああ……よろしく頼む」
english: 'Give me a bit more time... please. /OK... that's fine. Tonight then. /Sorry... take care of it.'

japanese: ……全部平らげると、/もれなく保健体育の点数を/１０点プラスしてやるが、それでもか？
english: ...If you finish it all, /I'll add 10 to your P.E. grade. /Still want to?

japanese: ……彼女がお酒を飲んでなければ、/の話ですがね。
english: ...Assuming she hasn't /been drinking, of course.

japanese: ……正直な話、/今日、キミと話している間も、/そんな事ばっかり考えていた。
english: ...Honestly, /even while talking to you today, /I kept thinking about that.

japanese: ……闘志が湧く……。
english: ...Fighting spirit rises...

japanese: ……生徒会室って、なんだか怖そうな人が/出入りしてるみたいなんだけど、/一体何をやってるのかしら？
english: ...The student council room seems /to have scary people coming in... /What are they doing?

japanese: ……わかった。/奴の動き、引き続き監視しろ。
english: ...Understood. /Keep monitoring him.

japanese: ……今夜？/何かあったの？　ロイ。
english: ...Tonight? /Something happen, Roy?

japanese: ……今日は遊んで……、/また、明日から頑張ろう……。/お互いにな……。
english: ...Let's have fun today... /and work hard tomorrow... /Both of us...

japanese: ……出世の事か？/そこまで心配はしてないけどな。
english: ...About advancement? /Not that worried about it.

japanese: ……私だって、/好きで家事が苦手なわけじゃないわよ。/上手くなる方法があれば……
english: ...It's not like I'm bad at /housework by choice. /If there's a way to improve...

japanese: ……金魚すくいだ。/金魚はいい……。
english: ...Goldfish scooping. /Goldfish are nice...

japanese: ……何アレ？/修一先輩の追っかけ？
english: ...What's that? /Shuichi-senpai's fan?

japanese: ……今夜？/何かあったのか？　ロイ。
english: ...Tonight? /Something happen, Roy?

japanese: ……大学での練習風景を録ったビデオを/見せてやるといって……、/渡すのを忘れていたんだ……。
english: ...I said I'd show you a video /of university practice... /but I forgot to give it...

japanese: ……我らが育った社会では、/何も珍しい事ではないのだ。
english: ...In our society, /this is nothing unusual.

japanese: ……金魚すくいだ……。/金魚はいい……。
english: ...Goldfish scooping... /Goldfish are nice...

japanese: ……何か食べようと思うんだが……、/何を食べたいのか、わからないから……/考えていたんだ……。
english: ...I want to eat something... /but I don't know what... /so I was thinking...

japanese: 「……そうか。仕方ないな。/　で、出発はいつ……今から？/　また急な話だな……」
english: '...I see. Can't be helped. /When do we leave... now? /Another sudden thing...'

japanese: 「また」はないでしょう？/でも事実なんだけどね。/今年も助っ人を頼んでるし。
english: 'Again'? Don't say that! /But it's true. /Asking for help again this year.

japanese: ……ネコが、/パンをくわえてたみたいに見えたぞ。
english: ...I thought I saw /a cat with bread in its mouth.

japanese: ……手伝ってやればいいじゃん。/実際ヒマなんだし。
english: ...Just help them out. /You're free anyway.

japanese: ……水泳部のみんなのところに戻る……。/またな……。
english: ...Going back to the swim team... /See ya...

japanese: ……アリガト。/参考にしとくよ……。
english: ...Thanks. /I'll keep that in mind...

japanese: ……食べられそうな気がしてきました。/頑張ります、隼人先生！！
english: ...I think I can eat it now. /I'll try, Hayato-sensei!!

japanese: 「初心に帰れ！」/オマエの燃える瞳が、/そう俺に語りかけてくるんだぜ。
english: 'Return to your origins!' /Your burning eyes /tell me that.

japanese: ……ネコが、/パンをくわえてたみたいに見えたわよ。
english: ...I thought I saw /a cat with bread in its mouth.

japanese: ……ミーのパパ、いつも忙しいから、/こういうイベントに/来たコトないデス……
english: ...Mee's Papa is always busy, /so he's never come to /events like this...

japanese: ……奴らが口にする/「友情」とやらの力を、/私は理解する事ができなかった。
english: ...I couldn't understand /the power of 'friendship' /they spoke of.

japanese: ……確かに、!0の/言う通りなのかもしれません。
english: ...Indeed, what !0 says /might be true.

japanese: ……私に出来ると思う？/委員長みたいな/しっかり者になれるのかなぁ。
english: ...Think I can do it? /Become reliable like /the chairperson?

japanese: ……難しいな……。
english: ...It's hard...

japanese: ……人を支配する事なく、/導いていく力、か……/私に、それができるだろうか？
english: ...The power to guide /without controlling... /Can I do that?

japanese: ……本当に？/なんだか悪いわね。/後でお礼をしてあげるわ。
english: ...Really? /I feel bad. /I'll thank you later.

japanese: ……迷惑じゃなければ、だけど……。
english: ...If it's not a bother...
